name: imptfc-server
description: Fulbito is an open-source platform for football associations/cooperatives.

scripts.dev: npx nodemon --exec 'DEBUG=funql* node src/index.js' -e js,env,json --watch src --watch package.json -- watch .env
scripts.docs: npx nodemon --exec 'npx jsdoc -t node_modules/docdash -c jsdoc.json' -e js --watch src/routes

author: Javier Leandro Arancibia (arancibiajav@gmail.com)
